description:
http://anidb.net/ch70624 [Helbram] in his original Fairy form has a smaller body with a pair of wings. He has a youthful appearance with periorbital dark circles around his eyes. He wears a long sleeved shirt accessorized with a sunflower-like collar. He is approximately 1300 years old.
Source: Nanatsu no Taizai Wikia
name: Helbram
